protocol.text: Either with or without auxin treatment for 1 day
7-day-old seedlings or 35-day-old plants in full-strength MS
Total RNA were extracted using QIAGEN RNeasy kit follwed by DNAse treatment. The RNA samples were further purified and concentrated by RNeasy MinElute Cleanup.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G

text: Affymetrix GeneChip assay were performed by the Affymetrix Gene Expression Service Lab (
), supported by Academia Sinica, Taiwan. The CEL files were imported into GeneSpring and normalized by the RMA algorithm.
